name: Dead Ship
description:
Dead Ship is an atmospheric isometric horror shooter. As a player You must explore the space station, fight the monsters and survive.

Game was developed by small team of three people in free time (mostly after work) in one year. We worked on the project fully remotely. And this is our first project.

Game is completely free. If you like and enjoyed gamplay, you may send as a small tip for beer or coffe :).

Control:

WSAD - movement
Left mouse button - shoot
Mouse scroll wheel - switch weapon
R - reload
E - interact
M - map

System requirements:

Best gamplay experience is in 60 fps.

To play in 1080p 60 fps it is recommended:
Cpu: i5 2400
Ram: 4gb ram
Gpu: GeForce GTX 960 2gb or equivalent
Storage: 350 mb disk space
